articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Refutes S. Korea's Racket of "North Korean Defectors"
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Refutes S. Korea's Racket of "North Korean Defectors"
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday as regards the row of "north Korean defectors" kicked up by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors:
					 The Lee group is now busying itself referring what it called the "defectors" issue even to the international arena including the UN Security Council in its foolish bid to internationalize national showdown.
					
					 The enemies abducted citizens of the DPRK who traveled to neighboring countries for their personal reasons or crossed the border for economic reasons. Calling them "evacuees" who "defected from the north" for a political reason, the group carried out psychological campaign against the DPRK only to be forsaken by history for its sordid nature.
					
					 The Lee group, which plunged the north-south ties to complete deadlock by pursuing unprecedented confrontation policy, and screwed up the tensions on the Korean Peninsula to the extremes, has again kicked up the worn-out racket of "defectors to the south" to divert strong public curse and denunciation.
					
					 As the "contingency" and "instability" much touted by it proved futile in the face of the firm resolve of the DPRK army and people dynamically advancing toward the bright future, united behind their leader in single mind, the group has made last-ditch efforts just like a drowning man catching at a straw.
					
					 Through the racket of "north Korean defectors", the group of traitors seeks to fault even its master as well as the neighboring countries, curb the atmosphere for friendship, cooperation, dialogue and improvement of relations from being created on the Korean Peninsula and the region, and make the evil cycle of confrontation and conflicts repeat.
					
					 All facts prove that the DPRK was quite just when it drew a final conclusion that it would be impossible to mend the north-south ties, to say nothing of ensuring peace and stability on the Peninsula and the region as long as the Lee group is left intact.
					
					 The group's desperate racket can catch no one's interest as Lee is more dead than alive.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Austrian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Austrian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Josef Muellner, new Austrian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: DPRK Team Wins in Group League of 2012 AFC Challenger Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Team Wins in Group League of 2012 AFC Challenger Cup
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK men's soccer team won the first place in the group league matches of the 2012 AFC Challenger Cup.
					 The DPRK team's last league match with the Indian rival took place on March 13.
					
					 At the match, the DPRK team beat the Indian rival 4:0 through medium-and long-distance kicks and thrusts in the goal area with 2 or 3 players' passes.
					
					 The DPRK team will have the semi-final match with the Palestinian team on March 16.

articles.title: Foreign Delegates Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Delegates Leave after Int'l Seminar
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The delegates of China, Netherlands, Denmark, Germany, the U.S., UK and Canada went back by air on Tuesday after taking part in the International Seminar on Forest and Landscape Restoration.
					 Leaving on the same day was the executive director of the Environmental Education Media Project.

articles.title: Spring Drive for Land Management Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Drive for Land Management Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A spring drive for land management is progressing apace in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.  
					In this regard, KCNA interviewed Vice Department Director Jon Chol Su and Chief Staff Hong Jong Bom of the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation.
					
					 Reporter: What kinds of projects will be carried out during this spring all-out drive for land management?
					
					 Jon: Spring is a suitable time for tree-planting. 
					
					 A tree-planting drive is going on across the country while tree nurseries work hard to increase saplings.
					
					 The projects also include works to further improve regional forest conservation system for disinsection and prevention of fire and grasp the actual conditions on a regular basis and an undertaking for intensive road mending and careful management to remarkably give a face-lifting to all roads of the country.
					
					 Different provinces, cities and counties have already drawn up their workable plans to repair on a normal basis and take good care of main roads, including expressways and tourist motorways in their areas, conducting the organizational work for carrying them into practice.
					
					 Efforts are directed to setting up or repairing mileposts on roads, mending railways and sprucing up their surroundings.
					
					 Also a dynamic campaign is going on across the country to reinforce the embankment and dredge river-beds near roads and railways. 
					
					Reporter: Well, it is also important to spruce up cities and villages, I think.
					
					 Hong: That's right.
					
					 Main construction projects, including the construction in the Mansudae area, are being stepped up on a high level while various provinces are renewing the appearances of their cities in keeping with their local features. 
					
					 Provinces, cities and counties are tightening control over the local industrial establishments to install and use environmental protection facilities according to the rules.
					
					 They have also worked to upgrade the sewage purifying stations and run them on a normal basis.
					
					 Besides there are projects to build or repair fish ponds and mend ruined ancestral walls.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Refutes Sheer Misinformation Spread by Lee Group
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Refutes Sheer Misinformation Spread by Lee Group 
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- "Voice of People", an anti-DPRK radio of psychological warfare in south Korea, aired another despicable false story. 
					 It floated the rumor that the DPRK is conducting a jamming operation to ban the illegal use of cell phones by inhabitants in the northern border area and asked the Jilin Provincial government of China for "funds" when the latter requested its stop. 
					
					 It is an absolutely unpardonable action as it is part of the psychological warfare to impair the authority of the DPRK and sow seeds of discord between the DPRK and China. 
					
					 In order to make the story sound plausible, the south Korean group of traitors cited cell phone jamming in Jilin Province to serve its sinister purpose. 
					
					 However, it is too mean and clumsy trick to create discord, antipathy and misunderstanding between the peoples of the DPRK and China through such plots and hypocrisy. 
					
					 It is a circumstantial evidence that the Lee group works hard to tarnish the international image of the DPRK and do harm to the DPRK-China friendship at any cost. 
					
					 Lurking behind this smear campaign is a despicable plot to shift the blame for its sabotage operation through a mobile communication network onto the DPRK.
					
					 It is not a secret that the puppet Intelligence Service and other plot-breeding machines in south Korea have jammed air waves through a mobile communication network in a third country and persistently conducted a psychological warfare. The group's trumpeting about communication jamming by the DPRK is just like the guilty party filing the suit first. 
					
					 Explicitly speaking, there has been no abnormal practice of doing harm to the development of the relations between the DPRK and China in the border area and such thing can never happen. 
					
					 An ulterior aim sought by the puppet group in releasing ceaseless misinformation peppered with lies and deception through its reptile media is to internationalize distrust and hostility toward the DPRK and implement its scenario to stifle it. 
					
					 Tight-cornered internally and externally, the Lee group cooked up even the above-said story, pulling up not only the DPRK but also neighboring countries like a drowning man trying to catch at a straw. But such sleight of hand will bring it nowhere. 
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for the above-said radio to try to sow the seeds of discord between the two countries.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Provocative Remarks of Lee Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Provocative Remarks of Lee Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Recently a spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Defense of south Korea blustered "it is not worth reacting" to the just sacred war of the north and "it is its stand to urge the north to stop the smear campaign". Puppet Minister of Defense Kim Kwan Jin appeared at a marine unit and cried out for "strongly punishing the north" in case "it provokes". Puppet Minister of Unification Ryu U Ik talked nonsense about "internal adjustment" and the like, seriously defaming the dignified system of the DPRK. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a blatant challenge as the heinous provocation is touching off wrath of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 What the Lee group of traitors did in a more challenging manner is nothing but renewed extreme confrontation hysteria of the foolish group of gangsters going reckless unaware of the real arms of the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and its real war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee group of traitors is, indeed, the gangsters adding to their crimes committed before the nation, not content with the criminal acts committed during the period of mourning over the great loss to the nation. The Korean nation can never live even a single day in peace and the danger of war to the Korean Peninsula will never be defused as long as they are allowed to breathe in the same land and the same sky.
					
					 It is hard to communicate with the group of traitors hell-bent on confrontation with the fellow countrymen. The Lee group keen to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen into a sea of blood should be wiped out only with arms just as a rabid dog should be beaten to death with a big stick.
					
					 What awaits the Lee group of traitors is a merciless punishment by all servicepersons and people of the DPRK and the nation's stern judgment as it committed the most hideous provocative act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Japan Must Settle Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Minju Joson Japan Must Settle Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Japan must redeem its past crimes including the sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have denied all their crimes and persistently evaded the responsibility for them, though over 60 years have passed since the end of war, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 They have sought to shirk the state responsibility for the comfort women issue by describing it as a deed done by "individual prostitute businessmen". Some did not scruple to make such a reckless remark that the comfort women "volunteered to the job to make money".
					
					 Some time ago, the head of Seoul branch of Japan's Sankei Shimbun defiled the comfort women victims, calling them "prostitutes". He even contributed to a magazine an article which said they have received sort of treatment. This touched off broad public anger.
					
					 This shows that the Japanese reactionaries are coldhearted persons bereft of conscience and morality.
					
					 Their insincere attitude towards Japan's past crimes is a blatant challenge to the international community calling for their reparation for the past crimes. This will only add to their past crimes.
					
					 They are seriously mistaken if they think they can shirk the responsibility for the crimes.
					
					 They should be honest before the history and truth and opt for making an apology and reparation as soon as possible.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun DPRK's Sacred War of Retaliation Is Patriotic One
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun DPRK's Sacred War of Retaliation Is Patriotic One
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Korean style sacred war is a righteous one to punish all the anti-reunification elements who have curbed reconciliation and unity of the nation and plunged the north-south relations into deadlock. It is also a patriotic one to achieve the historic victory in the effort for the national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The anti-reunification forces have harmed national reconciliation and unity, whetted a sword for a war against the north and made the north-south ties fester. If they are left intact, the Koreans will only face disaster, let alone reunify the country, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors dampened the aspiration of the fellow compatriots for reunification through unprecedented confrontation policy toward the DPRK and brought increasing danger of a nuclear war to the Korean Peninsula in collusion with foreign forces. The group deserves severe judgment of the history for this crime alone.
					
					 The puppet military gangsters' gravest provocation against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is a product of the plot hatched by the group of traitors to stir up the atmosphere of confrontation between the north and the south and tide over the serious ruling crisis. Being driven into a tight corner inside and outside, the Lee group has kicked up frantic confrontation racket against the fellow compatriots to prolong its remaining days, clean indifferent to the destiny of the nation. No one knows what kind of adventure the group will risk more.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas suffer from the confrontation moves of the Lee group.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen should turn out to smash without mercy the traitors who challenge the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation and bring the danger of nuclear war, not content with selling the interests of the south Korean people through flunkeyism and breaking the north-south ties through confrontation with the compatriots.

articles.title: What Type of Man Lee Myung Bak Is
articles.content:
What Type of Man Lee Myung Bak Is
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- South Koreans call traitor Lee Myung Bak 2MB.
					 At first, they explained number 2 as his surname and M and B his name.
					
					 Feeling extremely disillusioned with the traitor from the outset of his office, they explained 2MB in diverse ways. They are now cursing and ridiculing him as human scum, ignorant and shameless, a big liar and a kingpin of irregularities and corruption.
					
					  2MB (2 megabytes) is a pronoun of Lee's thinking power as he has so poor knowledge and is narrow-minded.
					
					 This entered a south Korean vocabulary dictionary.
					
					 It is shame on south Korea that Myung Bak, the so-called "president," is registered in the dictionary as 2MB to be cursed by south Koreans.
					
					 Lee was reported to have practiced reading his inaugural address several times but he could not properly read its text, prompting even conservative media to claim "a president-elect should learn proper mother tongue."
					
					 He also failed to use computer for 10 days in Chongwadae for his lack of knowledge about it. "Zip your mouse, first" was the criticism he got as he talked nonsense at press conferences and meetings.
					
					 He leveled a rifle from its butt, becoming a laughing stock.
					
					 "Money is the best. Personality does not feed me". This is his "philosophy of life." This was why he was ridiculed by former officials of the Seoul City Office and Chongwadae as money maker and illiterate.
					
					 Among accusations made against him are such phrases as "policy just worth 2MB", " political imbecile", "the guy utterly ignorant of reunification", "Lee Myung Bak identical to Obama in the sense that he does not understand Korean language", "Lee Myung Bak's economic recovery is height of ignorance", "Learn more" and "Only president fails to know what even a mere child knows."
					
					 Surprised by Lee's poor performance, south Koreans shout "You, 2MB, do nothing. That's better" and "Don't breathe as it is pity to give oxygen to you." 
					
					 Myung Bak is also called "Mad Brain".
					
					 It is one of the letters written by south Koreans, giving vent to their indignation at the "Myung Bak Sansong" (there are containers in the middle of Seoul) piled up by traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 This means that Lee Myung Bak ate beef infected with mad cow disease imported from the U.S. and does everything crazy.
					
					 It is well-known fact that as soon as he came to power, he visited his U.S master. After fully opening south Korean beef market to the U.S., he behaved in so shameful manner that he told the south Koreans to "buy a lot of cheap and quality beef from the U.S.", while eating beef offered by his master. 
					
					 Since then, the traitor arranged a U.S.-made beef sampling party everyday at which he claimed it is tastier than local beef.
					
					 Angry shouts of such slogans as "Lee Myung Bak Is Mad Beef" and "Destroy Lee Myung Bak" were heard from every candlelight rally.
					
					 A south Korean politician once derided Lee Myung Bak as Liar Most Best, adding it is almost sickening to hear his lies.
					
					 His career is recorded with swindles and frauds.
					
					 After taking power, he distinguished himself in lies and deception.
					
					 His promises to serve the people and bring about economic recovery turned out to be whopping lies.
					
					 He was said to have shed tears of self-reproach on the hill behind Chongwadae. But he harshly cracked down on those who protested the import of American beef, and took part in candlelight rallies.
					
					 He made an election commitment to halve the registration fee but after taking office he kept a straight face, saying he never uttered such words. There are too many examples to prove that he is a big liar. He scrapped his plans for the construction of Sejong City and build a new airport in the southeastern region.
					
					 The south Koreans derided his office as a continuation of "All Fool's Day", urging him to "shut his mouth" and saying "2MB never opens his mouth without telling lies". 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak topped the list of candidates whose mouth the voters wanted to have shut in order to stop him from telling whopping lies and for this he received the prize of sowing machine frame. 
					
					 Lee is also called kingpin of corruption and irregularities.
					
					 A south Korean website carried a phrase saying "MB is acronym of Multi corruption," creating a sensation.
					
					 He raked tens of billions of won worth property when he worked as a constructor in markets. This would have been unthinkable without his inborn disposition as a swindler.
					
					 He even sold off his daughter to a big businessman for money.
					
					 Still stunning the people are hideous scams including the case of faking up BBK stock price and the case of purchasing a house premise in Naegok-dong.
					
					 MB is also interpreted as "cursed B" because south Koreans are loudly calling for the ouster of MB, saying he leads the nation to ruin.
					
					 From the olden times Koreans used to call a bad man "cursed B", which refers to life-threatening epidemic disease.
					
					 This is a clear reminder of the people's bitter hatred for him.
					
					 Lee is, indeed, a matchless fool, worst traitor, ultra-right fascist dictator, confrontation maniac and human scum who is fated to die before his time.

articles.title: Joint Memorial Service for Korean Victims of Great Quake in East Japan Held
articles.content:
Joint Memorial Service for Korean Victims of Great Quake in East Japan Held
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A joint memorial service for Koreans killed by the great quake in East Japan took place in Japan on Sunday on the occasion of its first anniversary.
					 Present there were Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and concurrently chairman of its Rights and Welfare Committee, leading officials of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, the Korean Youth League in Japan, the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan, the Union of Korean Central Educational Association in Japan and the Kumgang Insurance Company, chairpersons of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto and Tohoku regions and Miyagi, Fukushima, Iwate and Ibaragi prefectures, the afflicted areas, bereaved families, overseas Koreans and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence to the memory of the Korean victims.
					
					 A memorial address sent by the DPRK Committee for Overseas Koreans was read out there.
					
					 Ri Yong Sik, chairman of the Miyagi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, in his memorial address recalled that Koreans in Japan lost their lives and suffered indescribable disasters due to the greatest quake and tsunami in the Japanese history and the accident in the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant.
					
					 The relief fund sent by leader Kim Jong Il at that time served as life-saving water encouraging the afflicted Chongryon organization and Koreans in Japan in the drive for rehabilitation and resurrection, he said, adding:
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will never forget the loving care shown by Kim Jong Il to protect them.
					
					 Its participants paid floral tribute to the dead Koreans.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors' Most Hideous Provocations Assailed by JUK
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors' Most Hideous Provocations Assailed by JUK
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalist Union of Korea on March 12 issued the following statement in denunciation of the most hideous provocations committed by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors by abusing the name of media during the period of deeply mourning over the loss of the father of the nation:
					 The group of traitors that insulted the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is setting in motion vicious conservative media for an anti-DPRK smear campaign, claiming its will to make retaliation was "defamatory propaganda preempted by the north." It is also working hard to mislead public opinion by describing it as "a campaign for consolidating the system," a campaign for "scuttling general election" and "tactics for engaging the U.S. and blocking the south." 
					
					 The hearts of all the journalists and other media persons throughout the country are now burning with hatred at the renewed provocations of the group of traitors and their determination is running high.
					
					 It is something unprecedented in history that the hordes of such brutes let loose a whole string of invectives and committed evils against the noble image of the father of the nation and against all the mourners, not content with their acts of rubbing salt into the wounds of the compatriots grieving over the big loss to the nation.
					
					 The gravity and seriousness of the situation lie in that these hideous acts against ethics are being openly committed without let-up under the name of media.
					
					 Such unethical acts are something unimaginable as they could be committed only by those media which have abandoned their mission and duty as a spokesman of justice and truth and genuine leader of public opinion and are bereft of their reason. 
					
					 Media persons who should have contributed to the unity of the compatriots and reunification are now speaking for the confrontation fanatics after being bribed by a handful of traitors including Lee Myung Bak. All Korean media persons in whose veins runs the blood of the nation can never remain a passive onlooker to the present situation.
					
					 That is why we, journalists and other media persons are visiting every part of the country to cover the revenge-seekers, considering pens and mikes of revolution as arms to wipe out enemies. As a result, the resentment of all service persons and people are running high across the country.
					
					 We sympathize with the members of the trade unions of media organizations in their mass actions to boycott listening to reptile media and the production of broadcasting programs now under way every day and campaigns for ousting vicious stooges including the present chairmen of broadcasting services.
					
					 The Central Committee of the KJU bitterly condemns the smear campaign of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and reptile media as the most monstrous unethical crimes which can be committed only by animals in human skin and the most hideous barbarous acts of lacerating Koreans and bringing the bitterest disgrace to the history of the nation spanning five thousand years and the human history. 
					
					 Our sacred all-people war of retaliation has already started to sweep away the hordes of traitors more dead than alive from the arena of history.
					
					 The war for taking revenge upon the enemies a thousand times and precision retaliatory blows of our own style will shatter the despicable trumpets of the group of traitors to pieces at a single strike. 
					
					 Kept within the sighting telescope of our physical striking means and the range of our media campaign of justice are not only Chongwadae, the citadel of the group of traitors, but also Central District, Jongro District and Yongdungpho District, Seoul, where their accomplices and hack writers are concentrated and bases of smear campaigns.
					
					 We will clearly show the world how inexhaustible the might of unity of the great people all out to devotedly defend their leader and system is and how merciless their war of retaliation is.
					
					 Our brushes reflecting the unshakable resolution of all the service personnel and people will prove to be bombs and rifles wiping out the group of traitors to the last man.
					
					 We will be witnesses to history and protesters against the shuddering crimes of human scum and will see their miserable end to let not only the present world but posterity and human history remember them forever. 
					
					 All the journalists and media persons in the north and the south, Play the role of sharp daggers in the era and the people bringing to light the high treason committed by traitor Lee Myung Bak, military warmongers and wicked chairmen of media organizations.
					
					 Let the media deal a powerful blow at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and the reptile media with brushes of justice and make a breakthrough towards national reconciliation, unity and reunification.

articles.title: Suicide Rate Increases among U.S. Soldiers
articles.content:
Suicide Rate Increases among U.S. Soldiers
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The number of suicides is increasing among the U.S. soldiers, which is mainly blamed on war-phobia and despair.
					 Survey data issued on Mar. 8 said that in the 2007-2008 period the suicide rate of U.S. soldiers recorded 80 per cent increase from 2003 when the Iraqi war started.

articles.title: Pakistan Senator Accuses U.S. Military of Koran Burning
articles.content:
Pakistan Senate Accuses U.S. Military of Koran Burning
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Pakistani Senate adopted a resolution bitterly censuring the U.S. military for the recent burning of Koran at a U.S. military base in Afghanistan.
					 The resolution said that it was not the first time that the U.S. army desecrated Koran, adding similar incidents took place in the prison of Guantanamo base.
					
					 The resolution stressed that the government should demand the UN, the international community and the U.S. take steps against those who committed impudent acts.

articles.title: Iran to Intensify Advance to High Seas: Iranian Navy Commander
articles.content:
Iran to Intensify Advance to High Seas: Navy Commander 
 Tehran, March 12 (KCNA) -- The commander of the Navy of Iran in a press interview on March 10 said the country will intensify the advance to the high seas to protect the benefits of the country. 
					 Noting the country's navy fleets have successfully carried on their operational duties in the Oman sea, the Red sea, the Gulf of Aden, the northern area of the Indian Ocean, the Mediterranean, etc., he said it is the right of all countries to advance to the international waters abiding by international law as the high seas belong to all countries in the world.

articles.title: Cuban FM Condemns U.S. Hostile Act
articles.content:
Cuban FM Condemns U.S. Hostile Act
 Havana, March 12 (KCNA) -- Cuban Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla strongly condemned the U.S. hostile act against his country. 
					 Speaking in a press conference on March 8, the foreign minister said the U.S. is arresting Cuba from participating in the summit of the Organization of American States slated for April. He termed it an expression of hostility toward Cuba and an insult to it.
					
					 Such an act is unacceptable and unjustifiable, he said, stressing Cuba is not begging for its participation in the summit.
					
					 The economic, trade and financial blockades imposed by the U.S. on Cuba for decades amount to massacre, he noted.

articles.title: Tajikistan Opposes Sanctions on Iran
articles.content:
Tajikistan Opposes Sanctions on Iran
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Tajik foreign minister in a press conference on March 8 expressed the stand of the Tajik government opposing the West's sanctions on Iran.
					 All the pressure on Iran including economic sanctions is proving ineffective, he said, adding the sanctions are not a solution to the issue.
					
					 Tajikistan maintains the stand that the nuclear issue of Iran should be settled politically and diplomatically, he stressed.

articles.title: Israel's Airstrikes on Palestinians
articles.content:
Israel's Airstrikes Kill Five Palestinians 
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Five Palestinians were killed and five others wounded on Friday in two separate airstrikes of the Israeli army in eastern and southern Gaza City.
					 It was reported that 14 Palestinians were killed and dozens of others wounded in the airstrikes of the Israeli army on March 10.

articles.title: Afghanistan Condemns Killing of 16 Civilians by U.S. Soldier
articles.content:
Afghanistan Condemns Killing of 16 Civilians by U.S. Soldier
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Afghan president on Sunday strongly condemned the killing of 16 civilians, including nine children and three women, by a U.S. soldier in the country's southern province of Kandahar. The soldier broke into three houses and opened indiscriminate fire on them.
					 Five more people were injured in the incident. This killing has touched off great protest and denunciation by the locals.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Outbursts under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Outbursts under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is nowadays getting all the more pronounced in the moves against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea despite its warning of a retaliatory sacred war against the insult to the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					 The Lee group declared that it would not remove photos with defamatory words, displayed in barracks, and Defence Minister Kim Kwan Jin showed himself up in Yonphyong Island, where he called for "dealing a resolute and powerful punishment in retaliation for 'Cheonan' warship sinking and Yonphyong Island shelling."
					
					 The outbursts fuelled the tense situation of the Korean Peninsula, which was already strained by their insult.
					
					 An officer of the Korean People's Army, Ri Chang Su, told KCNA:
					
					"The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has opted for challenging the DPRK, rather than making an apology for their high treason.
					
					 If they persist in confrontation with the DPRK, we will not remain an onlooker to their moves.
					
					 Their thrice-cursed crime will never be tolerated.
					
					 They are greatly mistaken if they think they can survive our retaliatory sacred war."
					
					 Han Jong Nam, an officer of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, said:
					
					 "I warn the United States against protecting the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors keen in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 This group of rabid dogs is ignorant of the trend of times and bereft of ethics, as well.
					
					 Once an order is given, we will unhesitatingly turn out in the sacred war to annihilate the group of traitors and achieve national reunification."

articles.title: Working People Vow to Wipe Out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Working People Vow to Wipe Out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
						
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place every day at which working people of DPRK factories and enterprises vowed to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors through a merciless sacred war.
					 At the meetings the statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers at the meetings said that it was absolutely unpardonable that the group of gangsters deliberately committed crimes during the mourning period in the DPRK.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 It is the faith and will of all the servicepersons and people to destroy the enemies without mercy if they hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership even a bit as they value it dearer than their own lives.
					
					 The dignified idea and social system in the DPRK remain unfazed and hatred for the enemies by the servicepersons and people is growing bitterer a thousand times no matter how frantically the group of traitors runs amuck.
					
					 We will bring about great innovations in production and construction, each holding a rifle in one hand and a hammer in the other, and wipe out the group of rabid dogs with a hammer if an order is given.
					
					 The speakers called upon all service personnel and people to frustrate all the provocations of the enemies and dynamically hasten the general drive to improve the standard of people's living and build a thriving nation, single-mindedly united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Forcing Lee Myung Bak Group to Pay Dearer Price for Its High Treason
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Forcing Lee Myung Bak Group to Pay Dearer Price for Its High Treason
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- The Liaoning regional committee of the Federation of Korean Youth in China on Mar. 8 made public a statement entitled "We will force Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to pay a thousand-fold price for its thrice-cursed act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK." 
					 The statement said the reckless act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is a hysteric act which can be committed only by the group of ferocious gangsters and traitors to the nation.
					
					  We bitterly denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for committing without hesitation such hideous crimes against the nation and acts to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, not content with having brought the dark clouds of war to hang over the Korean Peninsula by staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills, the statement noted, and went on: 
					
					 It is the Lee Myung Bak group, the sworn enemy, with which we can never live under the same sky and the warmongers of the puppet military are hordes of traitors who should be wiped out by force of arms.
					
					 The above-said hideous provocation is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of a rabid dog on the verge of death.
					
					 The whole nation will never pardon the Lee group for the above-said thrice-cursed crime but sweep it away from the arena of history through a merciless sacred war of retaliation.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors' Most Hideous Provocations under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors' Most Hideous Provocations under Fire 
 Pyongyang, March 13 (KCNA) -- Party leaders, personages and organizations of different countries on March 7 and 8 issued statements slamming the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and staging  ceaseless maneuvers for a war against it.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, in a statement assailed the south Korean authorities for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with their large-scale provocative joint military drills with the U.S., thereby bringing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war again. 
					
					 Luis Mateo Munoz, general secretary of the Socialist Party of Peru, in a statement condemned the south Korean authorities for their provocations and war drills and demanded they immediately halt them.
					
					 Juzef Lachut, member of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party and the chairman of the Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee of the party, in a statement expressed full support for the Korean people in their struggle for defending the country's dignity, sovereignty and independence.
					
					 The Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in its statement pointed out that the south Korean authorities would face powerful physical blow of the army and people of the DPRK if they persistently kick up the racket for confrontation with it, making a mockery of the Korean people's grudge.
					
					 Trotsky Serano, president of the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador, declared in his statement the reckless acts perpetrated by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK are a blatant challenge to the Korean people and, at the same time, an intolerable insult to the world revolutionaries and progressives.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, in a statement urged the Lee Myung Bak conservative regime to make an immediate apology for the above-said provocations and voiced full support and solidarity with the Korean people's struggle.
					
					 Guillermo Alcazar Ribera, chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism, in a statement expressed conviction that the Korean People's Army and the people would surely emerge victorious in the struggle for defending the country's dignity and sovereignty.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio el mensaje que con motivo del septuagesimo aniversario del nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, le enviara el dia 9 el Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, Raul Castro Ruz.
					 La misiva va como sigue:
					
					 Estimado companero:
					
					 En ocasion del 70 Aniversario del natalicio del companero Kim Jong Il, le expreso nuestro homenaje por su valioso aporte al desarrollo de las excelentes relaciones bilaterales entre nuestros paises.
					
					 Reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador austriaco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador austriaco
 Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- Josef Muellner presento este martes en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Austria en Corea.
					 Tras recibirlas, Kim converso con el diplomatico.

articles.title: MINREX se entrevista con la ACNC por el caso de "fugitivos"
articles.content:
MINREX se entrevista con la ACNC por el caso de "fugitivos"
 Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea concedio este martes una rueda de prensa exclusiva con la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea (ACNC) con motivo de la pueril campana que lanza la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak escandalizando el tema de los "fugitivos norcoreanos".
					 Abajo sigue el texto integro de su respuesta a la ACNC:
					
					 En estos dias, la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak arma escandalo por doquier con el problema de llamados "fugitivos norcoreanos" ventilandolo en los escenarios internacionales como el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU en su intento de internacionalizar el enfrentamiento fratricida entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					 Anteriormente, los enemigos raptaron a nuestros ciudadanos, que realizaron viaje privado al pais vecino o salieron ilegalmente del pais por razones economicas y los describieron como "refugiados" por motivos politicos, quienes fueron utilizados luego en la guerra psicologica anti-RPDC.
					
					 Pero, al revelarse la naturaleza verdadera de ellos, la campana de aquellos tuvo que ser repudiado por la historia.
					
					 Pese a este hecho, la camarilla del traidor Lee, que llevo a la peor fase las relaciones intercoreanas y empeoro al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, vuelve a poner sobre el tapete el problema de "fugitivos norcoreanos" porque no le queda otro remedio para esquivar la condena y denuncia categoricas de los nacionales y extranjeros.
					
					 Es decir, esa campana resulta el ultimo coletazo de los que vieron errado su obstinado pronostico de la supuesta "situacion emergente" e "inestabilidad" de la RPDC en que todos los militares y civiles avanzan a pasos mas firmes hacia su futuro maravilloso unidos monoliticamente en torno a su lider.
					
					 Al escandalizar el problema de "fugitivos norcoreanos", la banda de Lee trata de cuestionar a los paises vecinos y hasta a su amo en su ultimo esfuerzo por repetir el ciclo vicioso de enfrentamientos y conflictos previniendo la creacion del clima de amistad, cooperacion, dialogo y mejoramiento de relaciones en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region.
					
					 Todos los hechos comprueban que es mil veces justa nuestra conclusion final de que si se deja intacta a la camarilla de Lee, no se puede lograr el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas ni la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					 En este mundo no hay tontos que hagan caso de esa campana desesperada de los traidores surcoreanos, que son cadaveres vivos.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza reportaje de la "Voz del Pueblo" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza reportaje de la "Voz del Pueblo" del Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 13 de marzo (ACNC) -- La "Voz del Pueblo" del Sur de Corea difundio la version erronea de que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea emite en la zona fronteriza septentrional unas ondas hertzianas para impedir el uso ilicito de telefonos celulares de los habitantes y demando "fondos" al gobierno de la provincia china de Jilin que urgio el cese de tales transmisiones. 
					 Este reportaje forma parte de la campana psicologica anti-RPDC y es un crimen nunca tolerable para manchar el prestigio de la RPDC y sembrar cizanas en la amistad Corea-China. 
					
					 Para dar "credulidad" a su desinformacion, la banda de los traidores surcoreanos saco el problema de comunicaciones defectuosas de la telefonia celular en la provincia de Jilin. 
					
					 Detras de ese reportaje mentiroso, esta la siniestra intencion de los traidores surcoreanos de imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad por su sabotaje mediante la red de comunicaciones de Network. 
					
					 No es un secreto que el Servicio de Inteligencia y otros aparatos intrigantes del Sur de Corea han desarrollado constantemente la guerra psicologica anti-RPDC creando perturbaciones hertzianas en la red de comunicaciones de Network de un tercer pais. 
					
					 La banda de titeres surcoreanos sigue difundiendo desinformaciones por conducto de medios venales de prensa para aplastar a la RPDC al crear en el ambito internacional la desconfianza y hostilidad a ella. 
					
					 Es muy ridiculo que la Voz del Pueblo, medio de prensa que se dedica a calumniar a la RPDC, intente sembrar discordias en las relaciones de esta con otros Estados.
